mapper.select: select m.* from ppm_milestone_checkpoint m where 1=1

select m.*, m.RELATEDTASKOBJECTCLASS RELATEDTASKOBJECT$$CLASS, task.classguid relatedtaskobject$$class, task.masterfk relatedtaskobject$$master from ppm_milestone_checkpoint m left join $tablename$ task on m.relatedtaskobject = task.guid where m.relatedtaskobjectclass = #RELATEDTASKOBJECT$CLASS#
select m.*, m.RELATEDTASKOBJECTCLASS RELATEDTASKOBJECT$$CLASS from ppm_milestone_checkpoint m where 1=1
mapper.insert:
insert into ppm_milestone_checkpoint (guid, typeguid, OWNERTYPE, relatedtaskobject, relatedtaskobjectclass, CHECKPOINTNAME, description, color, DATASEQ, actualfinishtime, planfinishtime, completionrate,
createuserguid, createtime, updateuserguid, updatetime) values (#GUID#, #TYPEGUID#, #OWNERTYPE#, #RELATEDTASKOBJECT#, #RELATEDTASKOBJECT$CLASS#, #CHECKPOINTNAME:VARCHAR:NULL#, #DESCRIPTION:VARCHAR:NULL#, #COLOR:VARCHAR:NULL#, #DATASEQ#, #ACTUALFINISHTIME:DATE#, #PLANFINISHTIME:DATE#, #COMPLETIONRATE:NUMERIC#,
#CREATEUSERGUID#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #UPDATEUSERGUID#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#)
mapper.update:
update ppm_milestone_checkpoint
TYPEGUID = #TYPEGUID#, OWNERTYPE = #OWNERTYPE#, CHECKPOINTNAME = #CHECKPOINTNAME#, DESCRIPTION = #DESCRIPTION#, COLOR = #COLOR#, DATASEQ = #DATASEQ#, RELATEDTASKOBJECT = #RELATEDTASKOBJECT#, RELATEDTASKOBJECTCLASS = #RELATEDTASKOBJECT$CLASS#, ACTUALFINISHTIME = #ACTUALFINISHTIME#, PLANFINISHTIME = #PLANFINISHTIME#, COMPLETIONRATE = #COMPLETIONRATE#,
updatetime = #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, updateuserguid = #UPDATEUSERGUID# where guid = #GUID#
